page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: Most trade in Sidlesham is done by small businesses. There are two general stores, one in Mill Lane with a sub post office and one at Sidlesham Common. Both sell food, stationery, cigarettes .There is also a perfume and make-up shop.One of the two garages,Paddock Service Station, has recently closed. The other,at Sidlesham Common has a workshop and post office.The car tyre clinic fit and sell new tyres. There is also a car body work specialist. The"Crab and Lobster", and"The Anchor", are the two public houses. There is a restaurant called"Amva House". The people that work on holdings sell their produce to: Sidlesham Growers,Southgate Growers,Fargo and Bleach of Lavant.
